reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

description.narrative: At present, OCHA is focused on responding to the current humanitarian crisis by:• Strengthening strategic coordination in Juba among the main stakeholders including the Government, donors, UN agencies, non-governmental and international organizations, in order to better respond to the humanitarian crisis.• Strengthening operational coordination at the cluster and state levels to optimize the humanitarian response to people in need.• Improving humanitarian access and space through monitoring and advocacy efforts informed by access incident data and best practices.

At present, OCHA is focused on responding to the current humanitarian crisis by:• Strengthening strategic coordination in Juba among the main stakeholders including the Government, donors, UN agencies, non-governmental and international organizations, in order to better respond to the humanitarian crisis.• Strengthening operational coordination at the cluster and state levels to optimize the humanitarian response to people in need.• Improving humanitarian access and space through monitoring and advocacy efforts informed by access incident data and best practices.
